title: Package Lag Since I Upgraded to New Client
body:
I was hesitant to update my Client Server to the new updated one and took the leap about a week ago. Besides the lag I am experiencing inside the client before the game (which is manageable), I am experiencing lag inside my games. Ping is fine (between 190-220, for South Africa this is good), my frames per second are always 60+ and I am still experiencing lag. Click to move or pressing a skill shot will takes 3 or more seconds. Sometimes just standing in a one place unable to move.

All this is new. With previous client I had no issues out or in game. 

Yes, I have changed my settings in my client to low specs mode and to close when in game. I have swapped between WiFi and cable. I've lowered my in game graphics as well. But still lagging.

Is there anything else I can do? I need help!!!

220 ping was okay for us her in South Africa. Made is dam hard to dodge any skill shots, but we could not tell that we had any lag.
